tool_description: Wallapi® is the official Wallapop API 📦
name: Wallapi®
title: Wallapi®

api_list.name: /user/stats
/user
/items
/search
api_list.description: Search up to 40 items, you can move the "n", product index parameter, in order to find all items

required_parameters.name: n
required_parameters.description: The product index it will start to retrieve

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: The keyword you want to find out

api_list.name: /categories/conditions
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://wallapi-r.p.rapidapi.com/categories/conditions"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "wallapi-r.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://wallapi-r.p.rapidapi.com/categories"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "wallapi-r.p.rapidapi.com"

api_list.name: /user/items
api_list.description: Search up to 40 items, you can use "/user/items/since" endpoint, in order to find all items

api_list.name: /user/items/since
api_list.description: Get user items since an specific item

required_parameters.name: since
required_parameters.description: Is the next token of Wallapop, you can obtain it from \"/user/items\" endpoint inside attribute \"next\"

api_list.name: /user/shippings
/user/reviews
api_list.description: Search up to 40 reviews, you can move the "init", product index parameter, in order to find all items

optional_parameters.name: init
optional_parameters.description: The init review index, if you don't pass the parameter, it will start from first review

api_list.name: /search/filters

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: The keyword you want to find out

required_parameters.name: n
required_parameters.description: The product index it will start to retrieve

optional_parameters.name: condition
optional_parameters.description: Condition parameter (retrieve available conditions at \"/categories/conditions\" endpoint)

optional_parameters.name: time
optional_parameters.description: Time from item creation parameter, available orders (\"today\", \"lastWeek\", \"lastMonth\")

optional_parameters.name: shipping
optional_parameters.description: Shipping avaiable parameter, set \"true\" to this parameter, or don't pass the parameter

optional_parameters.name: category
optional_parameters.description: Category parameter (retrieve available categories at \"/categories\" endpoint)
